meanings.sent1: The masseteric muscle helps us chew our food.
meanings.sent2: She felt a slight masseteric pain after eating a tough steak.
meanings.sent3: The masseteric muscle decided to take a break from all the chewing.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as a masseteric grip.
meanings.sent5: The masseteric movement of his jaw was visible as he chewed.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the masseter muscle.
meanings.sent1: The dentist examined her masseteric muscles during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: The masseteric strength of his jaw was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The masseteric muscle threw a party for the other muscles.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as powerful as a masseteric contraction.
meanings.sent5: The masseteric tension in his jaw indicated stress.
